Articles.Content:
It would be cool if we could find a way around the moderators.

The way you do that is open a whole new forum for just RP. Don't advertise it here though

Maybe make a reddit war. We could even do it on another website.

I also got my new pls 1440p asus pb278q. Gorgeous monitor.

So I don't have a company in the rocket builders forum but I recently made a flag.

Reacher Industries is proud to introduce (oh wait, is that too much roleplay? sorry. Here, I'll try again) I've been working on some cool ships I'd like to show.

The all new, completely untested ground forces line (left to right: light tank, missile truck, heavy tank):

The Desny Corvette, armed with 12 mini I-beam missiles:

And the flagship of our fleet, the Kirgard Battleship, shiny and new with Kerbpaint and armed with 8 I-beams and 4 SRB torpedoes:

My destroyer is undergoing a redesign because its internals get mashed up too easily.
Those tanks remind me if Robot Wars.

...its internals get mashed up too easily.

^Story of my life

^Story of my life

I've been thinking... since missiles often phase right through armour to damage the internal systems, why not build a ship with all the systems on the outside and armour on the inside?
Because armor is for the complete opposite purpose. The phasing is because of the armor thickness not it's existence.

Because armor is for the complete opposite purpose. The phasing is because of the armor thickness not it's existence.

That's an excellent point. I've scrapped the design of the Vindicator-Class because it would be too difficult to armor very well.

Not a thing-aling.

The new engine layout looks beautiful though.

I'm slowly getting closer.

Those tanks remind me if Robot Wars.

I miss that show...

- - - Updated - - -

^Story of my life

Hmm.... I wonder who was the guest author?

The way you do that is open a whole new forum for just RP. Don't advertise it here though

We tried that, remember? Me and you almost went to war and after that tension died so did the forum.

I don't know what is wrong with the bomber. When I loaded it up to check out the damage, it EXPLODED.

And now it won't let me click buttons. Time to reload KSP.

Edited June 27, 2014 by daemonCaptrix

I don't know what is wrong with the bomber. When I loaded it up to check out the damage, it EXPLODED.

And now it won't let me click buttons. Time to reload KSP.

Darn Krakens keep ruining battles.... time to nuke Bop from orbit again....

@daemon

I know on a Mac when the KSP starts acting bad I can go to this library of sorts and delete a file that has become corrupted. After that problem solved.

Im not sure on how it works on a PC though

Also, could someone test my upgraded 'Achilles' Battleship?

Download:http://www./download/7855tbta2u0sy4j/%27Achilles%27+Class+Battleship.craft#39;Achilles'_Class_Battleship.craft

I tested three battleships with three different ammunition types; HE, AP, and SRB.

HE was first.

The ship was torn apart. The round was made of a small Mono propellent tank and 8 sepratrons.

The next was AP rounds

The ship was completely destroyed. The AP round are made of a long girder and 8 sepratons.

The last was the SRB's.

The ship held up to the SRB's well. The SRB's had nothing attached to them.

More photos

The BP-1 Megasoma takes off for her first bombing run.

She gains as much altitude as she can handle, climbing to just over ten kilometers.

Diving at the heavily-armoured tanks below, she releases her first pair of bombs... a miss!

Time to cut our losses and head home.

A smooth landing.

The bomber still has one pair of bombs left. The fight's not over.

Persistent
Okay, thanks. It's good to know it can hold of SRBs.

I wouldn't mind some battle testing Jenkens, I'll wait for you to set up. In the mean time I'm going to try to break my new destroyer armour

Ok I'll say Bop with 200 tons. I'll set my side up.

So you'd rather someone else use them than space them 2.4km apart from one another so I can shoot at them?

Well you never told me to do that. :I

Also I can't do it cuz I don't have access to my PC.

Do it yoself. I have access to my PC on August1

So I don't have a company in the rocket builders forum but I recently made a flag.

http://i.imgur.com/ma8Dktt.png

Reacher Industries is proud to introduce (oh wait, is that too much roleplay? sorry. Here, I'll try again) I've been working on some cool ships I'd like to show.

The all new, completely untested ground forces line (left to right: light tank, missile truck, heavy tank):

http://i.imgur.com/Z6JWP9b.png

The Desny Corvette, armed with 12 mini I-beam missiles:

http://i.imgur.com/5E66BCD.png

And the flagship of our fleet, the Kirgard Battleship, shiny and new with Kerbpaint and armed with 8 I-beams and 4 SRB torpedoes:

http://i.imgur.com/JpoRrLU.png

My destroyer is undergoing a redesign because its internals get mashed up too easily.

Is that a Hetzer chassis I see? At least give some credit to Ksp Maniac

Is that a Hetzer chassis I see? At least give some credit to Ksp Maniac

No, I made all of these from scratch myself. Doing a quick Google search now, yes, it looks incredibly similar to the design in his video. I couldn't remember where I first saw something like that but yes you're right, although I wasn't using it as a reference when I was building it.

So I found this SRB in my tracking station that said it had been in space for 2.4 years (in-game) and was heading toward the sun, it turns out this was from testing the old 'Temeraire' Class and had been captured by Eve which altered it's orbit to impact the sun. It made me think about why I don't get rid of debris.

Ok I'll say Bop with 200 tons. I'll set my side up.

How many ships?

How many ships?

I've had them for a while, I just don't advertise them I guess. Most of my spacecraft are small too, mostly Strikecraft and Light frigates
